description: Returns a paginated list of all available controls in the Amazon Web Services Control Catalog library. Allows you to discover available controls. The list of controls is given as structures of type controlSummary. The ARN is returned in the global controlcatalog format, as shown in the examples.

nested_items.name: Controls
nested_items.description: Returns a list of controls, given as structures of type controlSummary.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The display name of the control.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the control, as it may appear in the console. Describes the functionality of the control.

nested_items.name: Behavior
nested_items.description: An enumerated type, with the following possible values:

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: An enumerated type, with the following possible values:

nested_items.name: Implementation
nested_items.description: An object of type ImplementationSummary that describes how the control is implemented.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: A string that represents the Amazon Web Services service that implements this control. For example, a value of AWS::Config::ConfigRule indicates that the control is implemented by Amazon Web Services Config, and AWS::SecurityHub::SecurityControl indicates implementation by Amazon Web Services Security Hub.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: The identifier originally assigned by the Amazon Web Services service that implements the control. For example, CODEPIPELINE_DEPLOYMENT_COUNT_CHECK.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that notes the time when the control was released (start of its life) as a governance capability in Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.
